Package fr.cnrs.iees.properties

Interface ResizeablePropertyList

All Known Subinterfaces:
ExtendablePropertyList
All Known Implementing Classes:
ExtendablePropertyListImpl
public interface ResizeablePropertyList

This interface contains the methods required to make a property list extendable.

The contract is as follows: add...() methods will add a new property to the list while set...() methods will only set a value for an existing property. They should return an error if the property does not exist.

Author:
J. Gignoux - 13 f√©vr. 2017

    • getPropertyValue

      Object getPropertyValue​(String key, Object defaultValue)
      get a property value matching 'key'; if no storage space for 'key', will create it and fill it with 'defaultValue' before returning it.
      Parameters:
      key - the property to get
      defaultValue - the value to set the property to if the key does not exist yet
      Returns:
      the property value matching 'key'

      Returns:
      this instance for agile programming
